column3: “Pink Cookies is a extreme rarity! it isn't pink, it's not the best fragrance and it isn't the worst. Pink Cookies texture is a comfortable chunky with semi-rich earth tone colors and a floral, earth, exotic fruit aroma before being lit. After lighting the Pink Cookies, the aroma shifts to a deep sensual earth fragrance with the effects being in the 90% range of euphoria (mental) with calm, focused, sociable, self-enl...”
“Really enjoy Pink Cookies... it's a fuck you up" strain
column4: but it isn't too heavy. Probably you won't want to do a crossword or wire a circuit board
column5: but chatting and gaming will definitely be enhanced. My suggestion... Pink Cookies

column3: “Grown by NWCS WA - 9/1/2016 : 26+ THC - Loving this strain. Gassy diesel funk with a sweet kushy/cherry after taste that lingers on the tongue well after exhale. Heavy Cookies Terps and a HEAVY Indica couchlock stone to help relax after a long day. Taste 8.7/10 Potency - 9.1/10 - Bag Appeal - 8.4/10. Overall 8.8/10. This batch is in my Top 5 flowers so far for 2016.  (Grade = 8.8 A-) A top shelf Keeper.”

“When you have to question, did I move from my desk to the kitchen to grab a snack and then move to the sofa to sit down and enjoy said snack, how did I get here? Did that really happen? That's what you're in store for. Well at least I was.

Seriously can't stress and I'll go full Obi Wan here and say do not under estimate the power of this strain. Especially vaping. You'll feel it take hold after the first 2 pulls an...”

“Grown by NWCS DOH 9-5-16: very dense, hearty buds that sparkle with trichomes. my batch smelled strong and earthy with a peppery pungent flavor on exhale. after one toke I could feel the heavy  25% THC content start to wash over me and it was all smiles from there! This is an amazing strain that I use at the end of the day for a full body relaxed feeling. heavy sedation relieves pain and stress. Pink Cookies is a win...”
“its a nice body high that makes your whole body relaxed. Helps with pain and zens your mind”

“pink cookies, pink cookies, this bud strain had me out. it is great for sleeping, it's euphoric and will get you high!! it's a heavy indica. mine was 26% it smelled and taste so good! super in love with pink cookies. my budz were the mini. budz. I'd recommend to anyone who enjoys indica!”

“This is my Favoirte Strain. Period, The End.

Wedding cake is a good other name for this strain because she is best waifu of weed. Northwest Cannabis Solutions knocked it out of the galaxy with this. Every time i run out of weed I buy this. Even when I want to try other strains, I get a gram at least of Pink. 

Long lasting body effects gives this strain a huge longevity of high. You peak early, but then you settle i...”
“Pink Cookies is a relaxing indica with a sedative effect. Great for users who experience paranoia. Excellent for insomnia.”
“perfect for a snacks, TV,  gaming session.”
“one of the best phenos of GSC only better which is hard to come by.. a definite must try.. 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥”

“The PC that I tried is an indica that instantly offered pain relief and relaxation. Eyes very heavy, soothing body high hitting muscles/bones/joints. Love the taste...even the aftertaste that doesn't seem to end was pleasant. Leafly's flavor profile and a few previous comments sum it up well. Cheers”

“this strain was amazing. 
its great because if you want to, you can be super adventurous and tag a skatepark but its also good enough to play ps4 and eat a giant toblorone with friends.
it really does fuck you up though. (i smoked hellaaaa) 
my mind constantly drifted and once i regained consciousness i was confused at either what i was doing, saying, or where i was.”

“Pure bliss! All around I love this nug! Smells/looks/taste & buzz all top notch! Pink Cookies will leave you floating in an extremely relaxed and worry-free state. Clears your mind of frantic thought and elevates the body into a tingly buzzing feel, through to the core. 
My favorite part about this strain is it's lack of negative effects. No paranoia, no anxiety spikes or heat flashes, minimal burnout. I'd say the on...”

“2 of my favorite strains in one. I’ve had the flower from CA, they were dense, small buds. Taste hearthy sweet and citrusy. Great hybrid. The oil taste more slightly sweet earth, spice and citrus. Smokey peet moss, grapefruit, chai tea and black pepper. This strain needs a better name, it’s off putting to amateurs that it doesn’t taste like cake or cookies at all. I’ve seen pink cookies more often than wedding cake b...”

“Wow, my favorite cookie strain. The smell is sweet and stinky. Like a creamy over growth of eucalyptus with exotic wood and a hint of grapes. I can’t stop enjoying the aroma. Taste is the aroma extremely amplified. Relaxed, euphoric, creative, uplifting. Tight compact buds of various greens from light to dark with purple scattered. Nice amount of bright neon orange hairs. Decent amount of milky trich. Oh, the smell I...”

“The PC that I tried is an indica that instantly offered pain relief and relaxation. Eyes very heavy, soothing body high hitting muscles/bones/joints. Love the taste...even the aftertaste that doesn't seem to end was pleasant. Leafly's flavor profile and a few previous comments sum it up well. Cheers”

“NWCS in WA state. 24% Eighth for 20! It has different shades of green with hints of purple and small orange hairs. Super crystally and dense. Smells weedy/earthy with hint of sweet citrus. Smoke felt heavy in lungs and didn't take much to get there. Comes on slow and eases you into a relaxed, uplifted state. Heavy in body and mostly a lazy high but doesn't force you to stay on the couch if you don't want to.  Will de...”
“Great body high, earthy, musty taste and very uplifting and light. Smiled and giggled with wonderful people!”

“Soo dense and sticky. Top shelf indica dominant with great head effects. One of the few indicas I've tried that makes you feel both high and stoned at the same time. Meditative and mentally relaxing with a touch of creativity and introspection mixed with some body melt.. yes please. I think in the future any indica dominant with GSC genetics will be a baseline for fabulous phenotypes and crosses to come”
“Pink Cookies (Wedding cake).  I want this strain at my wedding.  👌.  I feel like I'm floating on a cloud of loveliness.”
“Delicious all around. Epic hybrid. Nice body high without the couch lock or munchies. Very giggly. I adore giggly strains. :)”

“I have only had the pleasure of this strain once... Wanted to buy more but sadly, it was gone and by gone I mean I cannot find it at all lol... If you get a chance to smoke this I highly recommend it. Great to smoke with friends and socially!”
“No munchies. Nice high”
“Pink Cookies (Wedding cake).  I want this strain at my wedding.  👌.  I feel like I'm floating on a cloud of loveliness.”
“No munchies. Nice high”
“loved this in a blunt!! gave me that happy space cadet feeling!! but also super relaxed”

“Got to try Private Reserve's Pink Cookies last night, amazing strain! Classic cookie buds, pretty small but dense as a rock and louder than your grandma trying to wake you up for church! Very potent indica, had me walking around around like a blissed out zombie. Pretty pricey at $55 for an 8th but great as a special occasion smoke. Shout out to Local Roots Bothell, they have the flame!”
“If you like great tasting weed this is the strain for you 🍒🍪”

“You can definitely taste the pink! This one tickled my throat a little, as most pink strains do. Strong cerebral effect, tastes nice and peppery with floral hints. Would definitely recommend to anyone. I wouldn’t smoke this one before you have anything important to do!”

“Great potent strain! Keeps me kinda confused, but just enough to get things done! Strangely, I find myself easily aroused when smoking pink cookies too. The buzz doesn't last as long as I would like tho, hence de 4 stars.”

“My favorite strain by far. I'm a daily indica smoker and use it for anxiety and ocd. This strain smokes smooth with a sweet and peppery aftertaste that gives you that good lung expansion feeling in your lungs. After about 15-20 minutes you start to feel a slight pressure on the crown of your head that eventually turns into a hard body stone. I'm almost positive the people who are saying this makes them energetic are ...”
“Super heavy strain. Made me super tired and its hits make you high for a sustained amount of time without really a peek high.”

“If you like being horny and laughing your ass off, this strain is for you (:
One of the best aphrodisiacs aside from Gooberry. 
Very smiley Strain too 😍”

“All of your stress and worries disappear as you take a hit and enter a deep relaxation mode. It's the perfect strain to smoke near the end of the day or two hours before bed. Pink Cookies will you make you very tired, I was only able to stay up for one hour after smoking one bowl.”

“Better known as Wedding Cake this strain is worth enjoying when you come across it. Buds are amazing. Dense, dark green & dark purple in color & are covered in bright dark orange pistils with crystal trichomes. Scent & flavor was interesting kind of a sweet & spicy. Effects made me happy & euphoric followed by relaxation without being sleepy unless i over smoked or it was the end of the day. Indica dominate with 18% ...”

“The flower itself is amazing, when I break open the nugs they're a solid purple on the inside and light green on the outside. The high is very chill and euphoric. I could see this strain working for a variety of ailments.”

“Just scooped this wax tonight. Not my local dispo.This was very pungent and good. It's getting harder I will say to find a good optimal wedding cake. It's my 6th+ time buying wedding cake(pink cookies) Everytime it's been a different company but similar skunk fire gas smell super fucking pungent”
“This is a beautiful flower with a purple center reminds me of a blood orange gives you a mellow body high good after a long day of work”
“Best bud I've smoked in a while! I love Pink Cookies. Tastes sweet and delicious and it gives an instant kick!”
“This is some good stuff. I was feeling irritated and anxious. I smoked this and within minutes I was feeling calm and relaxed. It also has a nice taste and smokes smoothly”
“Great smell & great taste!! in my opinion one of the best strains for the night before bed.”
“Nice dense smooth strain second time I've got it. It's always been dense.”
“NWCS up in Washington State produces  a very beautiful product for this strange with a flavor thats second to none and a fantastic classic Indica high. Cant get enough of this strain.”

“Number 3 on my list of favorites. Pink Cookies is a nice dense nug, this is a very similar strain to Sunset Sherbet, with a wonderful taste and aroma. The flower should have some purpling. I have only found one grower that can grow this strain to my liking.”
“The lady loves it for the bedroom enhancing potential. It makes you feel sexy. The high is more in the body and pleasant.”
“By far one of my choice strains grown by Northwest Cannabis Solutions was packed with dense frosty people and green buds loaded with tons of piney sweet flavor packed with 28.10% thc”

“One of the best strains I've had 
Top Tier”
“overall a good strain.  no couch lock. a surprising upbeat motivated type high.  but it didn't help my anxiety at all.”

“This is actually my fav strain. other strains I have to take 6-8 hits to even feel anything bc most are 16-19% while pink cookies I've bought have been 29% so i take 2-3 and im feeling it my body tingles and feeling good. I would recommend to anyone and I'm a picky person.”

“Defiantly has that cookie Gene. This bud gets better as it burns down. The formation of the cylax. The frost is super even. The smell fresh out the package is pungent. All around a beautiful bud tho original cookies still a better choice in my opinion.”

“Pheno I got was rather racy. Pretty heavy onset off the rip. Not recommended for people who can't keep their shit together. Flavor didn't scream the parent strains at all, was earthy and somewhat harsh. 

I'm willing to say the company whose cut I was smoking didn't have their shit together. Will report back when I try another pheno”
“Tastes like white cake on exhale. Nice chill bud that gives a little body tingle.”
“one of my favorites smooth indicated high, kind of makes one tingle.”
“Tastes good and is good to smoke lightly all day.”
“I was lucky to get 27%+ thc in my batch of PinkCookies and let me say Fire asf only way to describe  it 🔥”

“By the first hit, you feel the head high hit instantly. After about 20 min you feel the relaxing wave wash over you, if you're busy doing something around the house great strain for a move. Nice cuddling strain too!”

“i bought some sherbet and it was purpe-blue-green-white stuff just like a candyland i tried in la.. i guess they are coming from gsc genetics or maybe sherbet genetics i don't know..but that blue-green-purple-white stuff..whenever i tried it's good..whatever..it was same company and looks like the sherbet i tried and i opened the bag..looks and smells same..less dense and little less high..sherbet was better..it's mo...”

“The batch I purchased, tested 26.6% THC, with 0% CBD. So I kinda see why this is labeled an Indica/hybrid. The high is extremely heady at first, then slowly mellows down in about an hour. Ideal for indoor activities, or relaxing.”
“Smokes good, but gave me a wicked panic attack. Sativa dominant.”
